name: savannah cardi
notes:
*cool summer nights call for the perfect cozy layer – meet the savannah cardi!* 

when the evenings start to cool off, the savannah cardi is your go-to light layer. this breezy tunisian crochet cardigan is full of personality, making it a stylish addition to any summer-to-fall wardrobe. designed with beginners in mind, it’s quick to make and easy to customize, so you can adjust the fit and style to suit your taste. *new to tunisian crochet? don't worry! this cardigan is beginner-friendly and includes a tutorial video!*

*[view this pattern for free on my blog!][1]*

**materials**

* 655 (715, 795, 865, 935) (990, 1060, 1130, 1200) yards worsted weight yarn. sample made with lion brand landscapes breeze in the colorway "willow"
* 8mm tunisian crochet hook
* 6mm traditional crochet hook
* scissors
* tape measure
* tapestry needle
* locking stitch markers
* wet blocking supplies

**techniques**

* tunisian crochet foundation, forward, and return pass
* tunisian arrowhead stitch
* seaming crochet
* crochet ribbing
* wet blocking technique

**measurements**

sizes available for finished bust 38" - 70" (to fit sizes 28" - 62")
